text:
The city police on Tuesday arrested a person on charges of stealing 34 gunny bags of toor dal from a godown in Leigh Bazaar Market here. Muruganandam, a trader in the market, found the front lock of his godown broken and toor dal worth Rs. 2 lakh missing on January 31. He lodged a complaint with the Pallapatti police. A CCTV footage in the area revealed that the bags were loaded into an autorickshaw. The vehicle number was traced to Vinothkumar of Shevapet.

He was picked up for questioning and he accepted the crime.

The police also recovered the stolen goods.
title: Man held for stealing toor dal
